model.elements

Class GraphicShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.elements.GraphicShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GraphicEllipseShape, GraphicRectangleShape, GraphicTriangleShape

    public abstract class GraphicShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Generic shape component of a graphic element.
    Author:
    geomaster
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
